name: Crush Escape
description:
Move geometry blocks in different shapes with all your agility to push through an array of obstacles and reach to the destination.
Heed on those tiny little pikes that appear out of nowhere.
Any retarded reaction would relentlessly destroy the characters.

Gameplay
Tap & hold the screen to move the geometry characters;
Swipe left and right to change the current role;
Swipe up and down to zoom in or zoom out the screen.

Features
- 30 well-designed levels with a variety of elements;
- Beautiful BGM to spice up your geometry adventure;
- Easy to play while challenging for level passing.
